courses.title: Full Stack Developer - Back end Development
courses.description: Graduated from Soy Henry! This course opened the doors to enter the world of programming. It has been my passion, and I'm longing for personal and professional growth in this career.

courses.title: Full Stack Developer
courses.description: Student on Digital House. This course is under the Santiago Del Estero government Scholarship called METAS, which also opened a door for a regional environment programming, putting me alongside incredible teachers and partners.

projects.title: Make my PC
projects.description: This is my final project in Henry, made alongside a wonderful group of students and friends. It is what made me specialize in backend.
projects.backend: The database is running on PostgreSQL, which is connected to a GraphQL and TypeScript server.
projects.frontend: The client of this project is made with a React and Apollo server environment.
features: Display products in multiple carousel-type views
Multiple filters: by price, brand, and name
Login and register functions (paired with Auth0)
Dashboard for the Admin (CRUD operations for products and users)

projects.title: PokeApp
projects.description: This is my PI from Henry, a full-stack project made by myself.
projects.backend: The server of this project is running on Express, MySQL, and Sequelize.
projects.frontend: The client for this project is running React-Redux and Vite.
features: Create new pokemons and new types of pokemon
Working alongside the PokeApi to display information

projects.title: SportGO
projects.description: This is a group project that I'm working on under the Digital House teaching.
